label: 中宮
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: One of two title that might be granted to the consort of a reigning emperor, the other being kōgō (which see). When two consorts held the two titles simultaneously, the chūgū tended to be the more influential. [皇后]
